models.title: Model Profiles
models.description: Configure LLM providers and API keys for parallel execution
models.noModels: No models configured. Add your API keys to get started.
models.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
models.displayNameHint: A friendly name to identify this model

github.title: GitHub App Configuration
github.description: Connect a GitHub App to create pull requests and access repositories.
github.appIdHint: Find this in your GitHub App settings page
github.privateKeyHintExisting: Leave blank to keep existing key. Paste new key to update.
github.privateKeyHintNew: Paste the private key generated from your GitHub App
github.installationIdHint: Find this in your organization's installed apps settings
github.envVarsDesc: You can also configure the GitHub App via environment variables:
github.envConfigHint: To modify these values, update your .env file and restart the application.

defaults.title: Default Repository & Branch
defaults.description: Set default repository and branch to use when creating new tasks.
defaults.configureGitHubFirst: Configure GitHub App first to select default repository.
defaults.repositoryHint: Select the repository that will be pre-selected when creating new tasks.
defaults.branchHint: Select the branch that will be pre-selected when creating new tasks.
defaults.branchPrefixHint: Prefix used for new work branches (e.g., dursor/abcd1234). Leave blank to use the default.
defaults.prCreationHint: Choose whether "Create PR" creates the PR immediately or opens the GitHub PR creation page.

language.title: Language Settings
language.description: Choose your preferred language for the interface.
language.languageHint: Select the language for the user interface.

welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.heading: Welcome to dursor!
welcome.description: A self-hostable multi-model parallel coding agent. Complete the setup to get started.

welcome.step3Desc: Run parallel AI agents on your code
